query:
ALTER TABLE users 
ADD COLUMN companyName varchar(255) NULL,
ADD COLUMN position varchar(255) NULL,
ADD COLUMN phone varchar(50) NULL,
ADD COLUMN address text NULL,
ADD COLUMN city varchar(100) NULL,
ADD COLUMN postalCode varchar(20) NULL,
ADD COLUMN country varchar(100) NULL,
ADD COLUMN industry varchar(100) NULL,
ADD COLUMN howFound varchar(100) NULL,
ADD COLUMN status enum('active','suspended','deleted') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'active',
ADD COLUMN profileCompleted tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN termsAcceptedAt timestamp NULL,
ADD COLUMN privacyAcceptedAt timestamp NULL;
